title: Hour 2: Stefon Diggs
description:
Stefon Diggs joins the show to talk about the heat in Sunday's loss to the Dolphins. The Shipping Container react to Stephen A.'s Top 5 NFL teams. Chris and Chris share tales from Heat Media Day. Billy shares his Useless Sound Montage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
